title: Open Canada
description: Specifically tailored for Canadian researchers, government agencies, and public institutions, this Open Canada dataset is available for anyone interested in exploring Planet offerings. The data included in this Open Canada Catalogue (the "Licensed Material") is made available under the [Creative Commons CC BY-SA 4.0 license](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/). Use the following attribution for any redistribution of the Licensed Materials, "Open Canada STAC Data, available at https://www.planet.com/data/stac Â© [YEAR] Planet Labs PBC. All Rights Reserved", and preface with "Adapted from..." for any Adapted Material. Where [YEAR] means the year in which the data was captured, as indicated for each data item. Additional details can be found at: https://www.planet.com/canada/open-data/
